import React, { useState } from 'react' export const JobForm = () => { const [state,setState] = useState({ formData: { first_name: '', position: '', status: 'applied', password: '', conf_password: '' } }) const changeHandler = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; setState({...state, formData: {...state.formData, [name]: value}}) } return (
submitHandler(e,state)}>
) }
